pull.title: Introduce BigEndian wrapper and use it for netaddress ports
pull.body:
This is another small improvement taken from #10785.

Instead of manually converting from/to BE format in the `CService` serializer, provide a generic way in serialize.h to serialize BE data (only 16 bits for now).

events.message: Introduce BigEndian wrapper and use it for netaddress ports

events.body: Removed the `if (sizeof(I) == 2)` clauses, and added extra comments and checks.

utACK ece88fd.

Makes sense to also replace `unsigned short port` and `unsigned short GetPort()` with uint16_t?

comments.body: To more easily extend this later (if needed) to other sizes. I can get rid of them if that's confusing (they're always known at compile time).
At the moment is confusing/redundant because of the static assert above. Keep it simple?
